page.title: 14SAGA Day in Lostock
page.content:
On Saturday 15th of June I went to {Lostock's SAGA Day.}We wrote our name, address and telephone number on the programme to be put in a{raffle.
After we had done that we went round until we found the{tombola.}I paid 20 pence and chose a ticket, I looked at it, hoping there would be a{five or a {zero}at the end of the number on it but there was'nt. My friend picked one out and it was a{winner.}She won some {'china tea'.}I decided to have another go and I didn't win again. It just was'nt my luck. My friend had a go on a{darts game, she gave me one dart and I broke it.
We waited for our Mums to come and pick us up. We decided to walk up to the shop and get some sweets. Afterwards we walked back home.
